name: places/ChIJYw5hDhRZwokRn2nSG1PdtxA
adrFormatAddress: 880 5th Ave # 1H, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: Exceptional experience! I saw BK for my first acupuncture session and he is the best! He really takes his time to listen to your conditions and to explain what he's doing as he's doing the treatment. At the end of my session, I could already start to feel some relief. Thank you so much to the AHC! I will definitely be back

text.text: Exceptional experience! I saw BK for my first acupuncture session and he is the best! He really takes his time to listen to your conditions and to explain what he's doing as he's doing the treatment. At the end of my session, I could already start to feel some relief. Thank you so much to the AHC! I will definitely be back

originalText.text: Wow. I can truly say I’ve never felt for cared for by a health provider. From start to finish, my experience has been amazing with AHC. The office manager (I believe her name is Annie? I should know this!) is so friendly and helpful, sending texts to you to check in on how you’re feeling the next day and making sure the scheduling process is a breeze. BK was my first acupuncturist and words cannot explain how truly cared for I felt while he sat with me to learn my story, and then sat with me more throughout the acupuncture session when I was anxious about the needles talking to me about his life to distract me. He also checked in with me afterward, sending me detailed lists of PT stretches to do. Then, I saw Rimma next time. She had such a gentle and maternal touch and reminded me to breath through the session. She helped me relax so much, I actually fell asleep (something that’s hard for someone with insomnia and so much daily stress!). I will most definitely be back and I would 100% recommend this place to anyone!

originalText.text: Great acupuncture practice that addresses all of your health concerns. Very knowledgeable team of practitioners, great relaxing environment and variety of services from acupuncture to physical therapy which is very convenient at the same facility! Can’t recommend this place enough!  You will feel pampered, get amazing results quickly and feel very relaxed and stress-free in the busy NYC.

originalText.text: I would like to share this review and personally thank you all employees are at advanced holistic ‘s that opened recently on the upper east side.  From the moment of scheduling my first appointment to creating a follow up visit, everything was smooth and professional.  Center is clean and practitioners attentive, and knowledgeable.  After my third session, I was a new person.  Thank you very much for care you provide!

originalText.text: Love that they alway run on time. Also, the studio is very clean and hygienic which is important to me! I have been there for several appointments already and will continue to go since the acupuncture is helping improve my condition (consistent headaches).
